CmdLine: build_pkgs="wget ca-certificates" &&     apk update &&     apk upgrade &&     apk --update --no-cache add ${build_pkgs} &&     update-ca-certificates &&     mkdir -p ${TEAMCITY_INSTALL_PATH} &&     wget -O /tmp/TeamCity-${TEAMCITY_VERSION}.tar.gz https://download.jetbrains.com/teamcity/TeamCity-${TEAMCITY_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     tar xzf /tmp/TeamCity-${TEAMCITY_VERSION}.tar.gz -C ${TEAMCITY_INSTALL_PATH} &&     rm -rf ${TEAMCITY_INSTALL_PATH}/buildAgent &&     sed -i -e "s/\.*<\/Host>.*$/<Valve className=\"org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteIpValve\" protocolHeader=\"x-forwarded-proto\" \/><\/Host>/" ${TEAMCITY_INSTALL_PATH}/TeamCity/conf/server.xml &&     mkdir -p ${TEAMCITY_DATA_PATH}/lib/jdbc &&     rm -f ${TEAMCITY_DATA_PATH}/lib/jdbc/mysql-connector-java*.jar &&     wget -O /tmp/mysql-connector-java-${MYSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}.tar.gz http://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/Connector-J/mysql-connector-java-${MYSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     tar xzf /tmp/mysql-connector-java-${MYSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}.tar.gz -C /tmp &&     cp /tmp/mysql-connector-java-${MYSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}/mysql-connector-java-${MYSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}-bin.jar ${TEAMCITY_DATA_PATH}/lib/jdbc/mysql-connector-java-${MYSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}-bin.jar &&     rm -f ${TEAMCITY_DATA_PATH}/lib/jdbc/postgresql*.jar &&     wget -O ${TEAMCITY_DATA_PATH}/lib/jdbc/postgresql-${POSTGRESQL_VERSION}.jar http://jdbc.postgresql.org/download/postgresql-${POSTGRESQL_VERSION}.jar &&     rm -f ${TEAMCITY_DATA_PATH}/lib/jdbc/sqljdbc*.jar &&     wget -O /tmp/sqljdbc_${MSSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}_enu.tar.gz https://download.microsoft.com/download/0/2/A/02AAE597-3865-456C-AE7F-613F99F850A8/sqljdbc_${MSSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}_enu.tar.gz &&     gzip -d /tmp/sqljdbc_${MSSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}_enu.tar.gz &&     tar xf /tmp/sqljdbc_${MSSQL_DRIVER_VERSION}_enu.tar -C /tmp &&     cp /tmp/sqljdbc_${MSSQL_DRIVER_MAIN_VERSION}/enu/sqljdbc4.jar ${TEAMCITY_DATA_PATH}/lib/jdbc/sqljdbc4.jar &&     mkdir -p /home/${CONTAINER_USER} &&     addgroup -g $CONTAINER_GID -S ${CONTAINER_GROUP} &&     adduser -u $CONTAINER_UID  -S -D -G ${CONTAINER_GROUP} -h /home/${CONTAINER_USER} -s /bin/sh ${CONTAINER_USER} &&     chown -R ${CONTAINER_USER}:${CONTAINER_GROUP} /home/${CONTAINER_USER} &&     chown -R ${CONTAINER_USER}:${CONTAINER_GROUP} ${TEAMCITY_INSTALL_PATH} &&     chown -R ${CONTAINER_USER}:${CONTAINER_GROUP} ${TEAMCITY_DATA_PATH} &&     apk del ${build_pkgs} &&     rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* &&     rm -rf /tmp/* &&     rm -rf /var/log/*
Commands.Name: run
